__e: And I know that you're in a tight spot and everything... [clattering]
I need to get my hands on 20 grand a bit lively, and you heard about our problems in Spain...
This city's in a jam, and you're going to pull us out of it.
For twenty years, you sent him away.

She's in a hurry to leave.
